author: ESPNcricinfo staff
description: New Zealand, in familiar conditions overhead and underfoot, cruised past Bangladesh by four wickets in Clontarf to stay unbeaten in the tri-series
title: Bennett, Neesham lead New Zealand's canter

author: BBC Sport
description: Lions must be ready for "hardest weeks of rugby they will ever have faced" warns Gavin Hastings, captain on the 1993 New Zealand tour.
title: British and Irish Lions 2017: Gavin Hastings recalls 1993 New Zealand tour

author: The Preview by Mohammad Isam
description: Having won both their matches in the series so far, New Zealand have the chance to claim the trophy against an Ireland side lacking in impact players
title: NZ's chance to boost Champions Trophy momentum

description: Dylan Hartley may yet feature in the Lions tour of New Zealand after Ken Owens, the Wales hooker, was ruled out of the Scarlets’ play-off match against Leinster on Saturday with an ankle injury.
title: Dylan Hartley could earn Lions call-up after Ken Owens picks up ankle injury
